content:
eny Appointment

* Endpoint path: /api/appointments/{appointment\_id}/approve/
* Endpoint method: PUT
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Response: Updated appointment information with is\_approved set to true
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "vehicle_make": "string",
    "vehicle_model": "string",
    "vehicle_year": "integer",
    "vehicle_color": "string",
    "notes": "string",
    "is_approved": "boolean",
    "timer_total": "integer",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```

### Deny Appointment

* Endpoint path: /api/appointments/{appointment\_id}/deny/
* Endpoint method: PUT
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Response: Updated appointment information with is\_approved set to false
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "vehicle_make": "string",
    "vehicle_model": "string",
    "vehicle_year": "integer",
    "vehicle_color": "string",
    "notes": "string",
    "is_approved": "boolean",
    "timer_total": "integer",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```

Technician Endpoints
--------------------

### Create Technician

* Endpoint path: /api/technicians/
* Endpoint method: POST
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Request shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "personal_email": "string",
    "phone_number": "string",
    "client_id": "integer"
}
```
* Response: New technician information
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "employee_id": "string",
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "personal_email": "string",
    "phone_number": "string",
    "client_id": "integer"
}
```

### Get Technicians

* Endpoint path: /api/technicians/
* Endpoint method: GET
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Response: List of technicians
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
[
    {
        "id": "integer",
        "employee_id": "string",
        "first_name": "string",
        "last_name": "string",
        "personal_email": "string",
        "phone_number": "string",
        "client_id": "integer"
    }
]
```

### Get Technician Details

* Endpoint path: /api/technicians/{technician\_id}/
* Endpoint method: GET
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Response: Technician details
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "employee_id": "string",
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string",
    "personal_email": "string",
    "phone_number": "string",
    "client_id": "integer"
}
```

### Update Technician

* Endpoint path: /api/technicians/{technician\_id}/
* Endpoint method: PUT
* Headers:
	+ Authorization: Bearer token
* Request shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "first_name": "string",
    "last_name": "string
```
